pageContext.claim: “China -- their agreement didn't kick in until 2030. Right? Our agreement kicks in immediately.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump makes it sound like China does not need to do anything until 2030 but that's wrong. China, in its Paris Accord commitment, said that, compared to 2005 levels, it would seek to cut its carbon emissions by 60 to 65 percent per unit of GDP by 2030. China pledged to reach these goals by 2030, meaning they are taking steps now to meet their commitments.
